chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy S21 5G is having a problem:
I can no longer charge the phone, regardless of the cable used or the charging block. When I plug in the phone, it's not detected and won't charge at all. At first, I just couldn't access rapid charging anymore, then it got worse quickly, and now it's impossible to put it on charge.

Thank you for your help,


Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a portable computer or an electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process its refund (if you are eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer meets all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been erased.
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories as well as proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a portable computer or an electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 working days to process its refund (if you are eligible).

Hello ecomobile, 
You have received the product for repair the 31/05/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 06/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Ange from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we are unable to repair the device and we do not have enough stock to process an exchange. I have proceeded with a refund instead.

Regards,
RK
